attributes.action: Compulsory to have Mental Health First Aiders in all workplaces/schools/uni's
attributes.additional_details: I have Bipolar and part of the reason why I am still here today is because of the Mental Health First Aiders in my workplace, however have been in another job with no first aiders and have ended up being sectioned. I truly believe that if there was some-one there to support and help this could have been prevented. Can you imagine how much we can stop a crisis happening and how much money can be saved due to people not going off long term sick. If we had trained Mental Health GP's this would help
attributes.background: I would like the Government, like physical first aiders to have mandatory Mental Health First aiders in all organisations. Ability to spot signs and symptoms and prevent a crisis happening. Signpost to help people with their well-being and stop people completing suicide.
